markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Legendary Size](/Feats.aspx?ID=4013) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 56</row>

</column>

---

The vanaras of old were tricksters able to step across wide rivers or slip into impossibly small spaces. You can cast [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) and [_shrink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=284) once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells. You can target only yourself and other vanaras with these spells.
name: Legendary Size
